About Me

ABOUT ME

Hello! I'm a high school sophomore interested in all things STEM, more specifically computer science and mathematics.

I love promoting computer science ðŸ’» to the community â€” in fact, one of the causes I'm most passionate about is empowering women and non-binary individuals in the fields of STEM, in hopes of bridging the gender gap. I also love to get involved in the community â€” I'm currently one of sixteen elected student council officers school-wide, among many other things.

In my free time, I enjoy playing the cello, puzzling out fun math problems, and (attempting) to play tennis!

ACTIVITIES

Student Council Student Representative Officer

September 2019 - present

One of sixteen elected officers schoolwide who meet several times a week to plan important school events such as class socials, prom, homecoming, teacher appreciation, etc. Student representatives represent the class body and broadcast class announcements, promoting community involvement.
